p: Total viable count (TVC) as well as yeast and molds were determined using Plate count agar (PCA, Merck, Darmstadt, Germany) and Rose Bengal Chloramphenicol Agar (Liofilchem s.r.l, Italy), respectively, as previously described by Chen et al. [ 47]. Results were expressed as log CFU per g of fresh weight (log CFU g âˆ’1).
